Top-3 Similar Questions: so_66713365: Tinkerboard with RTC board does not update the system time

Explanations about Options.-f:
Override hwclock's default rtc device file name. Otherwise it will use the first
 one found in this order:
 /dev/rtc0
 /dev/rtc
 /dev/misc/rtc
 For IA-64:
 /dev/efirtc
 /dev/misc/efirtc
